meanings: Verb (카드경마 등에) 돈을 걸다, 도박을 하다

vlive.korean: 신성한 공연장에서 도박을 해? You gamble at this holy concert!? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 투 머치 토커 아이유
vlive.english: You gamble at this holy concert!?

vlive.korean: 도박입니다 이건. This is like a gamble. 듣기 View video YGKPLUS : 효니TV4제주올래? with music
굉장히 도박이에요. That's such a gamble. 듣기 View video ONSTYLE & Olive : [떠나보고서] MXM 임영민&김동현 PICK ME HELP ME ♥
여러분 진짜 올인 하시면 안 됩니다. Everyone, don't gamble. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Underdog - 언더독 '언더독, 전통놀이 한마당'
이거 무슨 토토예요? 아니, 무슨 뭐 시간까지 걸어요? Is this some kind of a gamble? Why are you betting on the time too? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 ep85_꾹이x하하vs파파스머프 안 오면 어쩔 건데?
vlive.english: Is this some kind of a gamble? Why are you betting on the time too?

examples.korean: Lost all your money? That’ll teach you to gamble. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 돈을 다 잃었다구? 도박을 하면 어떻게 되는지 알게 되겠군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lost all your money? That’ll teach you to gamble. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was wrong to gamble with our children’s future. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아이들의 장래를 두고 도박을 벌이는 것은 옳지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was wrong to gamble with our children’s future. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She knew she was taking a gamble but decided it was worth it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자기가 도박을 하고 있다는 것을 알았지만 해 볼 만하다고 마음을 먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She knew she was taking a gamble but decided it was worth it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They invested money in the company right at the start and the gamble paid off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 맨 처음부터 그 회사에 투자를 했는데 그 모험이 성과가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They invested money in the company right at the start and the gamble paid off. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The gamble paid off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 도박은 성공했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The gamble paid off. Add to Wordbook
